All functions

cdmCommentContents()
Insert flattened CDM records as an aligned R comment in the active editor

Export pregnancy results into shareable summary CSVs

Merge HIP and PPS episodes into a unified HIPPS episode table

Create a mock pregnancy cdm for examples and testing

runEsd
runHip()
Run the HIP pregnancy identification algorithm

runPregnancyIdentifier()
Run PregnancyIdentifier end-to-end (HIP + PPS + merge + ESD, optionally export)
